description: Provides a condensed summary of information that would otherwise be presented in a more detailed format. This decorator is useful for generating executive summaries, article summaries, or concise overviews of complex topics.

parameters.name: wordCount
parameters.description: Approximate target word count for the summary

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Where to position the summary in relation to any full content

examples.description: Short standalone summary of a complex topic
examples.usage:
+++Summary(length=short)
Explain quantum computing and its potential applications.
examples.result: Delivers a concise overview of quantum computing and its applications in approximately 2-3 sentences

examples.description: Specific word count summary at the beginning of a response
examples.usage:
+++Summary(wordCount=100, position=beginning)
Describe the causes and effects of climate change.
examples.result: Starts with a 100-word summary of climate change causes and effects, followed by more detailed information
